name: Back Squat
description: Validation rules for a back squat rep measured from keypoint-derived metrics.

rules.description: Hip should drop sufficiently relative to knee-hip distance.
Torso lean should be below threshold
Knee angle must remain above threshold

depth_ratio.fail: Depth insufficient: try lowering your hip until it reaches knee level.

torso_angle.warn: You are leaning forward; keep your chest up.

knee_angle_min.warn: Knee angle small, check knee tracking and control descent.
